block.p: ''We're aghast at the level of compensation that Nardelli is walking away with -- this is money directly out of shareholders' pockets.''

RICHARD FERLAUTO, director of pension investment policy for the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees, on the $210 million exit package for Robert L. Nardelli, the chairman and chief executive of Home Depot. [C5]
